data.expected_result: Autocomplete menu should either appear above the banner or hide/cover it like on Desktop
data.short_description: Autocomplete menu pulls the "You're viewing older messages" banner upwards
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel where you are allowed to type and where you can scroll through a long message history - Go to a point of the history where you can see the "You're viewing older messages" banner - Focus the textbox and insert @ or : character
